verses.name: Romans 7:13
verses.text: Was then that which is good made death unto me? God forbid. But sin, that it might appear sin, working death in me by that which is good; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful.

verses.name: Romans 7:14
verses.text: For we know that the law is spiritual: but I am carnal, sold under sin.

verses.name: Romans 7:15
verses.text: For that which I do I allow not: for what I would, that do I not; but what I hate, that do I.

verses.name: Romans 7:16
verses.text: If then I do that which I would not, I consent unto the law that it is good.
